description.ko: 청각 데이터를 시각적으로 표현한 ECHO-0는 보이지 않는 음파를 빛과 기하학의 구조적 걸작으로 변환합니다.
description.en: A visual representation of auditory data, ECHO-0 transforms invisible sound waves into a structural masterpiece of light and geometry.

prompt: A futuristic digital landscape showing ECHO-0 sound visualization, cascading holographic frequency waves, concentric glowing rings pulsating to a beat, deep obsidian background with neon cyan and electric violet accents, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, macro lens focus on digital particles.
